TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_pangkiw, title = pangkiw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/pangkiw} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:一半) pangkiw nu bicin ku pisakalabi ni Bunuk tu hemay. Bunuk 用半升米來煮飯.
(kamo no holam:一半) pangkiw no bicin ko pisakalabi ni Bonok to hemay. Bonok 用半升米來煮飯.
